etymology.description: Depicts a standing man with highlighted arm and leg -> symbolizes a 'person'
etymology.interpretation: 人(人) (rén, 'person') is a straightforward pictogram representing a simplified side view of a human figure, capturing the essence of a person through its minimal yet effective depiction of arms and legs.

examples.chinese: 他是一个善良的人(他是一個善良的人)。
examples.pinyin: Tā shì yī gè shànliáng de rén.

examples.chinese: 很多人(很多人)，聚集在广场(聚集在廣場)。
examples.english: Many people gather in the square.

examples.chinese: 每个人都有自己的故事(每個人都有自己的故事)。
examples.pinyin: Měi ge rén dōu yǒu zìjǐ de gùshì.
